snippet: A judge ruled Wednesday that two teenagers charged with first-degree murder must face a trial in the shooting death of an Australian student.
abstract: Oklahoma judge rules that Chancey Luna and Michael Dewayne Jones, teenagers charged with first-degree murder, must face a trial in the shooting death of Australian student Christopher Lane; prosecutors say third suspect James Francis Edwards Jr will testify against them and face a lesser charge.
lead_paragraph: A judge ruled Wednesday that two teenagers charged with first-degree murder must face a trial in the shooting death of an Australian student.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Teenagers Will Be Tried in Killing of an Australian Student
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Teenagers Will Be Tried in Killing of an Australian Student
